about_the_game:
Step into a frosty adventure with Snow Fortress 2, the thrilling sequel to the beloved VR snow fort building experience. Explore expansive winter landscapes, design your own icy fortress, and engage in exhilarating snowball fights against a horde of snowmen. Playable on Meta Quest, SteamVR, and Pico platforms, Snow Fortress 2 offers a winter wonderland of fun, activity, and creativity for all ages.

Features:
  • Immersive winter environments: Explore a winter forest and a charming village
  • Creative fort building: Construct your fortress with blocks of snow and ice
  • Exciting combat: Fight off an army of snowmen with improved mechanics and a variety of weapons
  • Multiplayer modes: Team up in co-op mode or challenge friends in PvP matches
  • Family-friendly and physically active: Duck, throw, and strategize in this fun-filled VR experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060, MD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Dive into a VR winter wonderland! Build your own icy fortresses, engage in epic snowball battles, and defend your village from an army menacing snowmen. Stay Frosty!
